titleStmt.title: The English Parnassus, or, A helpe to English poesie containing a collection of all rhyming monosyllables, the choicest epithets, and phrases : with some general forms upon all occasions, subjects, and theams, alphabeticaly digested : together with a short institution to English poesie, by way of a preface / by Joshua Poole.
titleStmt.author: Poole, Josua, fl. 1632-1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
